mapper.select: select e.idx, e.nickname, e.title, e.content, to_char(e.w_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as w_date, e.b_code, e.label, e.u_idx, c.b_idx, c.ori_filename, c.save_filename, c.ref, c.depth, c.step, c.thumb, c.idx, c.upload_type from board_${url} e join doc_storage_${url} c on c.idx = e.idx
mapper.insert: insert all into board_${url} (idx, nickname, title, content, b_code, label, u_idx) values (board_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, '${nickname}', '${title}', '${content}', '${b_code}', '${label}', '${u_idx}') into doc_storage_${url} (b_idx, ori_filename, save_filename, ref, depth, step, thumb, idx, upload_type) values (doc_storage_d_idx_seq_${url}.nextval, '${ori_filename}', '${save_filename}', '${ref}', '${depth}', '${step}', '${thumb}', board_idx_seq_${url}.CURRVAL, '${upload_type}') select * from dual
